content: 3 5mm hook and from hook one slip_stitch in round 14 decrease 8dc to make up neon green make a each of next three chain to end 18 sts magic_ring work 6dc one slip_stitch in tail tip fasten_off brontosaurus sew into ring six sts up end of body stuff fasten_off rnds 1-2 work head legs and sew to base as for rnds 1-2 of leg of body sew head brontosaurus body using 3 5mm hook and and neck to front of 18 sts make four neon orange make a body stuff and sew rnds 3-7 1dc in each using 3 5mm hook and magic_ring work 6dc tail to back of body st to end lightning white make into ring six sts stegosaurus sew up change to a magic_ring work 6dc rnds 1-7 work end of body insert lightning white into ring six sts as for rnds 1-7 of safety eyes into head rnds 8-11 1dc in each round 1 2dc in each st to stegosaurus head and stuff sew head letsgetcrafting com 25
